name: IndianPeacockSounds-6hourrelaxation
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: peacock sounds
des:
The Indian Peacock Sounds - 6-hour relaxation skill for Amazon Alexa will play the audio of peacock sound for 6 hours. You can use the Alexa skill by following usage methodology:
Session 1:
User: Alexa, open peacock sounds
Alexa: Starting Peacock Sounds - <audio> - You can say, start to begin.
User: begin
Alexa: Peacock Sounds <audio>
<Alexa completes the audio or user interruption>
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, peacock sounds
Alexa: Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to the counter of 6 hours> At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to Peacock Sounds. You can say, At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Thank You.

THE SKILL ONLY RESPONSES WITH THE AUDIO OF PEACOCK.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
